verses.verse: And <S%G2504>I<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, when I <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2596>with<s%> <S%G5247>excellency<s%> of <S%G3056>speech<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> of <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>, <S%G2605>declaring<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that are <S%G5046>perfect<s%>: <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> of the <S%G758>princes<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%>, <S%G3588>that<s%> come to <S%G2673>nothing<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> the <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3466>mystery<s%>, even the <S%G613>hidden<s%> <S%G3739>wisdom<s%>, which <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4309>ordained<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G165>world<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>:

<S%G3739>Which<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of the <S%G758>princes<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1487>had<s%> they <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G4717>it<s%>, they would <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G302>have<s%> <S%G4717>crucified<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G3788%G99999>Eye<s%> <S%G1492>has<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>seen<s%>, <S%G2532%G99999>nor<s%> <S%G3775>ear<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%>, <S%G2532>neither<s%> has <S%G305%G99999>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%>, the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G601>revealed<s%> them unto <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2045>searches<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>Yes<s%>, the deep <S%G899>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of a <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G1487%G99999>except<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>? <S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knows<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%>, <S%G1487%G99999>but<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G2983>received<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> we might <S%G1492>know<s%> the things <S%G3588>that<s%> are freely <S%G5483>given<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Which <S%G3739>things<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3056>words<s%> which <S%G442>man<s%>'s <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1318>teaches<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1318>teaches<s%>; <S%G4793>comparing<s%> spiritual <S%G4152>things<s%> with <S%G4152>spiritual<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G5591>natural<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1209>receives<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G3472>foolishness<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532%G99999>neither<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> he <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>them<s%>, because they are <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> <S%G350>discerned<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> is <S%G4152%G99999>spiritual<s%> <S%G350>judges<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G1161>yet<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> is <S%G350>judged<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G1097>known<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> he may <S%G4822>instruct<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>? <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3563>mind<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
